package.name: mootools
package.description: Contains mootools core and more.

package.name: moocore.core
package.description: Contains all moocore.core submodules

package.name: moocore.native
package.description: Contains all moocore.native submodules

package.name: moocore.class
package.description: Contains all moocore.class submodules

package.name: moocore.element
package.description: Contains all moocore.element submodules

package.name: moocore.utilities
package.description: Contains all moocore.utilities submodules

package.name: moocore.fx
package.description: Contains all moocore.fx submodules

package.name: moocore.request
package.description: Contains all moocore.request submodules

package.name: moocore
package.description: Contains all moocore modules

package.name: moocore.core.core
package.description: The core of MooTools, contains all the base functions and the Native and Hash implementations. Required by all the other scripts.

package.name: moocore.core.browser
package.description: The Browser Core. Contains Browser initialization, Window and Document, and the Browser Hash.

package.name: moocore.native.array
package.description: Contains Array Prototypes like each, contains, and erase.

package.name: moocore.native.function
package.description: Contains Function Prototypes like create, bind, pass, and delay.

package.name: moocore.native.number
package.description: Contains Number Prototypes like limit, round, times, and ceil.

package.name: moocore.native.string
package.description: Contains String Prototypes like camelCase, capitalize, test, and toInt.

package.name: moocore.native.hash
package.description: Contains Hash Prototypes. Provides a means for overcoming the JavaScript practical impossibility of extending native Objects.

package.name: moocore.native.event
package.description: Contains the Event Class, to make the event object cross-browser.

package.name: moocore.class.class
package.description: Contains the Class Function for easily creating, extending, and implementing reusable Classes.

package.name: moocore.class.class.extras
package.description: Contains Utility Classes that can be implemented into your own Classes to ease the execution of many common tasks.

package.name: moocore.element.element
package.description: One of the most important items in MooTools. Contains the dollar function, the dollars function, and an handful of cross-browser, time-saver methods to let you easily work with HTML Elements.

package.name: moocore.element.element.event
package.description: Contains Element methods for dealing with events. This file also includes mouseenter and mouseleave custom Element Events.

package.name: moocore.element.element.style
package.description: Contains methods for interacting with the styles of Elements in a fashionable way.

package.name: moocore.element.element.dimensions
package.description: Contains methods to work with size, scroll, or positioning of Elements and the window object.

package.name: moocore.utilities.selectors
package.description: Adds advanced CSS-style querying capabilities for targeting HTML Elements. Includes pseudo selectors.

package.name: moocore.utilities.domready
package.description: Contains the custom event domready.

package.name: moocore.utilities.json
package.description: JSON encoder and decoder.

package.name: moocore.utilities.cookie
package.description: Class for creating, reading, and deleting browser Cookies.

package.name: moocore.utilities.swiff
package.description: Wrapper for embedding SWF movies. Supports External Interface Communication.

package.name: moocore.fx.fx
package.description: Contains the basic animation logic to be extended by all other Fx Classes.

package.name: moocore.fx.fx.css
package.description: Contains the CSS animation logic. Used by Fx.Tween, Fx.Morph, Fx.Elements.

package.name: moocore.fx.fx.tween
package.description: Formerly Fx.Style, effect to transition any CSS property for an element.

package.name: moocore.fx.fx.morph
package.description: Formerly Fx.Styles, effect to transition any number of CSS properties for an element using an object of rules, or CSS based selector rules.

package.name: moocore.fx.fx.transitions
package.description: Contains a set of advanced transitions to be used with any of the Fx Classes.

package.name: moocore.request.request
package.description: Powerful all purpose Request Class. Uses XMLHTTPRequest.

package.name: moocore.request.request.html
package.description: Extends the basic Request Class with additional methods for interacting with HTML responses.

package.name: moocore.request.request.json
package.description: Extends the basic Request Class with additional methods for sending and receiving JSON data.

package.name: moomore.core
package.description: Contains all moomore.core submodules

package.name: moomore.class
package.description: Contains all moomore.class submodules

package.name: moomore.native
package.description: Contains all moomore.native submodules

package.name: moomore.element
package.description: Contains all moomore.element submodules

package.name: moomore.forms
package.description: Contains all moomore.forms submodules

package.name: moomore.fx
package.description: Contains all moomore.fx submodules

package.name: moomore.drag
package.description: Contains all moomore.drag submodules

package.name: moomore.request
package.description: Contains all moomore.request submodules

package.name: moomore.utilities
package.description: Contains all moomore.utilities submodules

package.name: moomore.interface
package.description: Contains all moomore.interface submodules

package.name: moomore.localization
package.description: Contains all moomore.localization submodules

package.name: moomore
package.description: Contains all moomore modules

package.name: moomore.core.more
package.description: Defines MooTools.More.version.

package.name: moomore.core.lang
package.description: Enables classes to contain text that can be localized to specific languages.

package.name: moomore.core.log
package.description: A default logger for MooTools. Logs to Firebug or a similar console unless it is not present.

package.name: moomore.class.class.refactor
package.description: Allows for a class to extend itself without damaging it's namespace.

package.name: moomore.class.class.binds
package.description: Adds the Binds Mutator to all classes.

package.name: moomore.class.class.occlude
package.description: Mixin class for preventing a class from applying itself to the same element twice.

package.name: moomore.class.chain.wait
package.description: Adds a delay method for chaining that allows you to easily introduce pauses.

package.name: moomore.native.array.extras
package.description: Extends the Array native object to include useful methods to work with arrays.

package.name: moomore.native.date
package.description: Extends the Date native object to include methods useful in managing dates.

package.name: moomore.native.date.extras
package.description: Extends the Date native object to include extra methods (on top of those in Date.js).

package.name: moomore.native.hash.extras
package.description: Extends the Hash native object to include getFromPath which allows a path notation to child elements.

package.name: moomore.native.string.extras
package.description: Extends the String native object to include methods useful in managing strings (query strings, urls, etc).

package.name: moomore.native.uri
package.description: Provides methods useful in managing the window location and uris.

package.name: moomore.native.uri.relative
package.description: Extends the URI class to add methods for computing relative and absolute urls.

package.name: moomore.element.element.forms
package.description: Extends the Element native object to include methods useful in managing inputs.

package.name: moomore.element.element.measure
package.description: Extends the Element native object to include methods useful in measuring dimensions.

package.name: moomore.element.element.pin
package.description: Extends the Element native object to include the pin method useful for fixed positioning for elements.

package.name: moomore.element.element.position
package.description: Extends the Element native object to include methods useful positioning elements relative to others.

package.name: moomore.element.element.shortcuts
package.description: Extends the Element native object to include some shortcut methods.

package.name: moomore.forms.formvalidator
package.description: A css-class based form validation system.

package.name: moomore.forms.formvalidator.inline
package.description: A css-class based form validation system.

package.name: moomore.forms.formvalidator.extras
package.description: Additional validators for FormValidator.

package.name: moomore.forms.overtext
package.description: Displays text over empty inputs until the user focuses the input or adds information.

package.name: moomore.fx.fx.elements
package.description: Effect to change any number of CSS properties of any number of Elements.

package.name: moomore.fx.fx.accordion
package.description: An Fx.Elements extension which allows you to easily create accordion type controls.

package.name: moomore.fx.fx.move
package.description: Moves an element to another location (relative to another element) with a transition.

package.name: moomore.fx.fx.reveal
package.description: Executes a transition from display:block to display:none and vice versa.

package.name: moomore.fx.fx.scroll
package.description: Effect to smoothly scroll any element, including the window.

package.name: moomore.fx.fx.slide
package.description: Effect to slide an element in and out of view.

package.name: moomore.fx.fx.smoothscroll
package.description: Class for creating a smooth scrolling effect to all internal links on the page.

package.name: moomore.fx.fx.sort
package.description: Reorders a group of items with a transition.

package.name: moomore.drag.drag
package.description: The base Drag Class. Can be used to drag and resize Elements using mouse events.

package.name: moomore.drag.drag.move
package.description: A Drag extension that provides support for the constraining of draggables to containers and droppables.

package.name: moomore.drag.slider
package.description: Class for creating horizontal and vertical slider controls.

package.name: moomore.drag.sortables
package.description: Class for creating a drag and drop sorting interface for lists of items.

package.name: moomore.request.request.jsonp
package.description: Creates a Json request using a script tag include and handles the callbacks for you.

package.name: moomore.request.request.queue
package.description: Manages a group of Request instances so that connections are queued.

package.name: moomore.request.request.periodical
package.description: Requests the same url at a time interval that increases when no data is returned from the requested server.

package.name: moomore.utilities.assets
package.description: Provides methods to dynamically load JavaScript, CSS, and Image files into the document.

package.name: moomore.utilities.color
package.description: Class for creating and manipulating colors in JavaScript. Supports HSB -> RGB Conversions and vice versa.

package.name: moomore.utilities.group
package.description: Class for monitoring collections of events.

package.name: moomore.utilities.hash.cookie
package.description: Class for creating, reading, and deleting browser Cookies in JSON format.

package.name: moomore.utilities.iframeshim
package.description: Creates a transparent iframe to mask out items not drawn by the browser (flash, select lists, etc) for IE6.

package.name: moomore.interface.scroller
package.description: Class which scrolls the contents of any Element (including the window) when the mouse reaches the Element's boundaries.

package.name: moomore.interface.tips
package.description: Class for creating nice tooltips that follow the mouse cursor when hovering over an element.

package.name: moomore.localization.date.english.us
package.description: Date messages in English (with conventions for the US).

package.name: moomore.localization.formvalidator.english
package.description: FormValidator messages in English.
